name: Eldritch Horror
description: A fragment of something beyond comprehension, summoned from the spaces between dimensions. Its very presence drives mortals to madness.

abilities.name: Maddening Gaze
abilities.description: Forces enemies to look upon its true form, causing madness.

abilities.name: Void Tentacles
abilities.description: Summons writhing tentacles that grab and damage enemies.

abilities.name: Reality Tear
abilities.description: Tears a hole in reality, creating a zone of chaos damage.

abilities.name: Incomprehensible
abilities.description: Cannot be directly targeted by single-target abilities.

abilities.name: Dimensional Collapse
abilities.description: Deals massive damage to all enemies on the map.
